From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

Two good thing about grenades are that they are noisy and flashy.
DrillBit saw and heard it coming. He was able to move, and only get hit
with the shockwave of the explosian. He found himself on the ground,
with dirt all over him. He hoped help would come. He returned fire.

::Predicon Base::

The auto-guns continued to fire continuesly on the Maximal.
